events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and will begin reviewing your qualifications shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department, specifically for the software development team.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to guide you through the next steps of the hiring process.
We completed your initial screening interview to assess your basic skills and fit for our software engineering role.
Thank you for providing your availability for the technical interview; we appreciate your prompt response.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 5th at 14:00 UTC with our senior software engineer.
You have successfully completed the technical interview where you demonstrated strong knowledge of software development practices.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 8th to discuss company culture, benefits, and your career goals.
Your HR interview went well, and the team feels confident about your fit within our engineering group.
We are pleased to extend you an offer for the Software Engineer position, including a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have accepted our offer verbally and provided positive feedback about the recruitment experience.
We officially recorded your acceptance of our offer and look forward to welcoming you aboard as a new engineer.
Your onboarding process has started with IT setup and orientation sessions to help you settle in smoothly.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your full integration into the engineering team completed.
